Northern Capitals, A Women-Only Tour | Insight Vacations | World Travellers - World Travellers Find your nearest store Destinations Our Deals About Blogs Contact Us SIGN UP Northern Capitals, A Women-Only Tour 10 days | Helsinki to Copenhagen Embark on an exclusive women-only tour with a small group and experience the best of the North with Insight Vacations . Begin your journey in Helsinki, where you'll explore the city's famed and fashionable food market. Wander among aromatic stalls offering local delicacies like smoked reindeer and licorice, immersing yourself in the vibrant flavors of Finnish cuisine. In Stockholm, dive into the city's vibrant music scene, from the iconic sounds of ABBA to cutting-edge modern productions. Let the rhythm of the city captivate you as you explore its cultural offerings. Next, journey to Oslo, where you'll have the opportunity to dine with multi-award-winning Norwegian athlete Isabelle Sandstedt Pedersen. Share stories over dinner and gain insight into her inspiring journey as a top athlete. In Denmark, explore the enchanting Tivoli Gardens and discover the opulence of Christiansborg Palace, the historic seat of Danish power. Marvel at the palace's grandeur and immerse yourself in Denmark's rich history and culture. Finally, relax and unwind with a private cruise along the waterways of Copenhagen. As you glide through the city, your captain will share fascinating insights into Copenhagen's history and landmarks, providing a unique perspective on this charming city. Deal Details Travel Dates 11 May, 8 Jun, 20 Jul, 17 Aug, 14 Sep 2025 Priced From $7,613 per person Enquire Now Embark on an exclusive women-only tour with a small group and experience the best of the North with Insight Vacations . Begin your journey in Helsinki, where you'll explore the city's famed and fashionable food market. Wander among aromatic stalls offering local delicacies like smoked reindeer and licorice, immersing yourself in the vibrant flavors of Finnish cuisine. In Stockholm, dive into the city's vibrant music scene, from the iconic sounds of ABBA to cutting-edge modern productions. Let the rhythm of the city captivate you as you explore its cultural offerings. Next, journey to Oslo, where you'll have the opportunity to dine with multi-award-winning Norwegian athlete Isabelle Sandstedt Pedersen. Share stories over dinner and gain insight into her inspiring journey as a top athlete. In Denmark, explore the enchanting Tivoli Gardens and discover the opulence of Christiansborg Palace, the historic seat of Danish power. Marvel at the palace's grandeur and immerse yourself in Denmark's rich history and culture. Finally, relax and unwind with a private cruise along the waterways of Copenhagen. As you glide through the city, your captain will share fascinating insights into Copenhagen's history and landmarks, providing a unique perspective on this charming city. Pricing 11 May, 8 Jun, 20 Jul, 17 Aug 2025 from $7,613* per person, twin share 14 Sep 2025 from $8,275* per person, twin share Itinerary Day 1 Fashionable Helsinki Day 2 Day at Leisure in Helsinki Day 3 Helsinki and Baltic Cruise to Stockholm Day 4 Stockholm, City of Islands Day 5 Stockholm Day 6 Stockholm to Oslo Day 7 Cosmopolitan Oslo Day 8 From Norway to Denmark Day 9 Wonderful Copenhagen Day 10 Fond Farewell to Cophenhagen Highlights Explore Helsinki, the harbour city and wander through the aromatic stalls of a traditional food market where you can sample local produce like liquorice or smoked reindeer. Visit Gamla Stan in Stockholm and see the cathedral where Swedish kings have been coronated. See the Oslo Opera House and the new Deichmann Library in the contemporary Bjørvika district. Visit Akershus Castle, Oslo Harbour, and the Royal Palace. Explore Copenhagen's regal sites and visit Christiansborg Palace and witness its stunning tapestries, furnishings, and décor. You'll also visit the Cathedral where the Crown Prince of Denmark married Princess Mary and view Rundetarrn, Europe's oldest functioning Observatory. Inclusions 9 nights' accommodation at select hotels. Meals, including 9 breakfasts & 5 dinners with wine. Personal radio headsets give you the freedom to wander during visits to famous highlights, without missing any of your Local Expert's fascinating commentary. Hotel and restaurant tips are included - you'll never have to worry about how much to give, nor search for foreign currency. We also include all taxes and porterage charges at hotels. We carry your bags for you and promptly deliver them to your hotel door. From time to time, your Travel Director will delight you with an Insight Flourish, which is a local specialty representing the destination. Stay connected with friends and family with our complimentary coach and hotel Wi-Fi (where available). If your arrival and/or departure flights are as per the itinerary start and end dates, then transfers are available at scheduled times. If your flights are outside these times, or you have booked additional nights accommodation with Insight Vacations, you may purchase transfers or make your own way from/to the airport. Terms & Conditions Prices are in NZD (unless specified otherwise) per person, in complete twin/double share accommodation (or single occupancy where specified), valid for new bookings only, subject to availability. Offers are capacity-controlled and may be reduced, changed, extended or withdrawn at any time, without notice. Unless specified, airfares (and often transfers) are additional. Pricing variations may occur due to fluctuations in currency exchange rates. Prices include savings/discounts where applicable and all taxes/charges (which are subject to change). Offers valid for travel originating in New Zealand only. Required deposit amounts and deposit/final payment dates vary by product booked. Deposits may or may not be refundable. Amendment and cancellation fees apply, which vary based on supplier. All products and itineraries are subject to change at the discretion of the supplier. Prices are based on cash, Eftpos, or Direct Credit payment only. We accept all major credit cards, however, processing fees apply. To be read in conjunction with the booking terms and conditions applicable for Insight Vacations. Please always refer to your World Travellers Consultant for full details. Travel documents & vaccination requirements are the responsibility of the individual traveller. Professional service fees may apply. Experience the world differently.
